alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Medina; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 12:30AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Medina, northeastern Frio, northwestern Atascosa, west central Wilson and southwestern Bexar Counties through 115 AM CST... At 1229 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moore, or 10 miles southwest of Devine, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Pleasanton, Pearsall, Devine, Poteet, Stinson Municipal Airport, Lytle, Somerset, Natalia, North Pearsall, Moore, Leming, Schattel, Bigfoot, Sandy Oaks, Von Ormy, Buena Vista, Iuka, Losoya, and Graytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
